pytenno.models.auctionsÔÉÅ

class pytenno.models.auctions.AuctionEntry(*, id: str, minimal_reputation: int, winner: Optional[str] = None, private: bool, visible: bool, note_raw: str, note: str, owner: str, starting_price: int, buyout_price: Optional[int] = None, minimal_increment: Optional[int] = None, is_direct_sell: bool, top_bid: Optional[int] = None, created: datetime, updated: datetime, platform: Platform, closed: bool, is_marked_for: Optional[AuctionMarking] = None, marked_operation_for: Optional[datetime] = None, item: Union[RivenAuction, LichAuction, KubrowAuction])[source]ÔÉÅ

Represents an auction entry.

Parameters

  • id (str) ‚Äì The ID of the auction entry.

  • minimum_reputation (int) ‚Äì The minimum reputation required to bid on the auction.

  • winner (str , optional) ‚Äì The ID of the user who won the auction.

  • private (bool) ‚Äì Whether the auction is private.

  • visible (bool) ‚Äì Whether the auction is visible to others.

  • note_raw (str , optional) ‚Äì The raw note of the auction.

  • note (str , optional) ‚Äì The formatted note of the auction. This is safe to include in HTML.

  • owner (str) ‚Äì The ID of the user who owns the auction.

  • starting_price (int) ‚Äì The starting price of the auction.

  • buyout_price (int , optional) ‚Äì The buyout price of the auction. If set to None, the auction cannot be bought out.

  • minimal_increment (int) ‚Äì The minimal increment of the auction. If set to None, the auction has no minimal increment.

  • is_direct_sell (bool) ‚Äì Whether the auction is a direct sell. Shortcut for starting_price == buyout_price.

  • top_bid (int , optional) ‚Äì The top bid of the auction. If set to None, the auction has not been bid on yet.

  • created (datetime.datetime) ‚Äì The time the auction was created.

  • updated (datetime.datetime) ‚Äì The time the auction was last updated. Bids count as updates.

  • platform (Platform) ‚Äì The platform the auction was created on.

  • closed (bool) ‚Äì Whether the auction is closed.

  • is_marked_for (AuctionMarking , optional) ‚Äì The action that will be executed on marked_operation_at.

  • marked_operation_at (datetime.datetime , optional) ‚Äì The time that the auction will be deleted / archived.

  • item (RivenAuction | LichAuction | KubrowAuction) ‚Äì The item being bid upon.

class pytenno.models.auctions.AuctionEntryExpanded(owner: UserShort, *, id: str, minimal_reputation: int, winner: Optional[str] = None, private: bool, visible: bool, note_raw: str, note: str, starting_price: int, buyout_price: Optional[int] = None, minimal_increment: Optional[int] = None, is_direct_sell: bool, top_bid: Optional[int] = None, created: datetime, updated: datetime, platform: Platform, closed: bool, is_marked_for: Optional[AuctionMarking] = None, marked_operation_for: Optional[datetime] = None, item: Union[RivenAuction, LichAuction, KubrowAuction])[source]ÔÉÅ

Same as AuctionEntry, but with a full user model for .owner

Parameters

  • id (str) ‚Äì The ID of the auction entry.

  • minimum_reputation (int) ‚Äì The minimum reputation required to bid on the auction.

  • winner (str , optional) ‚Äì The ID of the user who won the auction.

  • private (bool) ‚Äì Whether the auction is private.

  • visible (bool) ‚Äì Whether the auction is visible to others.

  • note_raw (str , optional) ‚Äì The raw note of the auction.

  • note (str , optional) ‚Äì The formatted note of the auction. This is safe to include in HTML.

  • owner (UserShort) ‚Äì The ID of the user who owns the auction.

  • starting_price (int) ‚Äì The starting price of the auction.

  • buyout_price (int , optional) ‚Äì The buyout price of the auction. If set to None, the auction cannot be bought out.

  • minimal_increment (int) ‚Äì The minimal increment of the auction. If set to None, the auction has no minimal increment.

  • is_direct_sell (bool) ‚Äì Whether the auction is a direct sell. Shortcut for starting_price == buyout_price.

  • top_bid (int , optional) ‚Äì The top bid of the auction. If set to None, the auction has not been bid on yet.

  • created (datetime.datetime) ‚Äì The time the auction was created.

  • updated (datetime.datetime) ‚Äì The time the auction was last updated. Bids count as updates.

  • platform (Platform) ‚Äì The platform the auction was created on.

  • closed (bool) ‚Äì Whether the auction is closed.

  • is_marked_for (AuctionMarking , optional) ‚Äì The action that will be executed on marked_operation_at.

  • marked_operation_at (datetime.datetime , optional) ‚Äì The time that the auction will be deleted / archived.

  • item (RivenAuction | LichAuction | KubrowAuction) ‚Äì The item being bid upon.

  • owner ‚Äì The owner of the auction.

class pytenno.models.auctions.KubrowAuction(type: AuctionType, name: str)[source]ÔÉÅ

Represents a kubrow auction.

Parameters

  • type (AuctionType) ‚Äì The type of the auction. In this case, kubrow.

  • name (str) ‚Äì The name of the kubrow.

class pytenno.models.auctions.LichAuction(*, type: AuctionType, weapon_url_name: str, element: Element, damage: int, having_ephemera: bool, quirk: Optional[str] = None, name: Optional[str] = None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Represents a lich auction.

Parameters

  • type (AuctionType) ‚Äì The type of the auction. In this case, lich.

  • weapon_url (str) ‚Äì The URL of the weapon.

  • element (Element) ‚Äì The element of the weapon.

  • damage (int) ‚Äì The damage of the weapon.

  • having_ephemera (bool) ‚Äì Whether the weapon has an ephemera.

  • quirk (str , optional) ‚Äì The quirk of the lich.

  • name (str , optional) ‚Äì The name of the lich. Unused by the API.

class pytenno.models.auctions.RivenAuction(type: AuctionType, attributes: list[pytenno.models.rivens.PartialRivenAttribute], name: str, mastery_level: int, re_rolls: int, weapon_url_name: str, polarity: Polarity, mod_rank: int)[source]ÔÉÅ

Represents a riven auction.

Parameters

  • type (AuctionType) ‚Äì The type of the auction. In this case, riven.

  • attributes (list[PartialRivenAttribute]) ‚Äì The attributes of the riven.

  • name (str) ‚Äì The name of the riven.

  • mastery_level (int) ‚Äì The mastery level of the riven.

  • re_rolls (int) ‚Äì The number of times the riven has been rerolled.

  • weapon_url_name (str) ‚Äì The URL of the weapon the riven is for.

  • polarity (Polarity) ‚Äì The polarity of the riven.

  • mod_rank (int) ‚Äì The rank of the riven.
